Articles.Content:
Show off your profile picture here! I made this since I have no idea where to show off my current one. Talk about where you got it or how you made it, and what it depicts.

Mine is a white rocket on a green background, using a light grayscale and green color palette. it's a very unrealistic and cartoonish rocket, but hey, it was designed for all parts of the community to understand. I made it myself with GIMP. I don't like how the shape of the rocket is, but I really like how I did the exhaust plume.
